## Connecting via Wired LAN (Ethernet)

Connect to an FTP server via wired LAN (Ethernet).

1. Connect to the network by plugging an Ethernet cable into the cameraâ€™s LAN connector.

2. Select **CREATE/EDIT CONNECTION SETTING > CREATE USING WIZARD** in the network/USB setting menu and choose **FTP TRANSFER**.

3. Select **CREATE NEW**.

   !FTP Transfer

   > ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
   > Choose **SELECT FROM LIST** to select from a list of existing connection setting profiles.
